title:
  zh-CN: 在线资源
  en-US: Map Online
---

## zh-CN

加载在线 arcgis for javascript 资源

```jsx
import { Map, Layer, Overlay, Feature } from 'hope-tmap';

const { GroupLayer } = Layer;
// const {LabelFeature } = Feature;

const map = new Map({
  target: 'Web3DCtrl',
});

const groupLayer = new GroupLayer({ xmlUrl: 'http://192.168.8.172:9081/test1.xml' });
// const labelFeature = new LabelFeature({
//   vecotorID: "test", 
//   layerID: 'test',
//   geom: {"coordinates":[[[-4292.157942629668,-49937.38115463649,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4344.420221078563,-50098.22790863392,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4428.982363938387,-50244.69383646403,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4542.148599791983,-50370.37767425914,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4678.973021100702,-50469.78643520965,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4833.475744096934,-50538.57547944586,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4998.904258399425,-50573.73839564817,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5168.028544119073,-50573.73839564817,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5333.457058421563,-50538.57547944586,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5487.959781417796,-50469.78643520965,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5624.784202726514,-50370.37767425914,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5737.950438580110,-50244.69383646403,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5822.512581439933,-50098.22790863392,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5874.774859888828,-49937.38115463649,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5892.453161576343,-49769.18334944978,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5874.774859888828,-49600.98554426307,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5822.512581439933,-49440.13879026564,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5737.950438580110,-49293.67286243552,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5624.784202726514,-49167.98902464041,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5487.959781417795,-49068.58026368990,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5333.457058421563,-48999.79121945370,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-5168.028544119072,-48964.62830325138,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4998.904258399425,-48964.62830325138,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4833.475744096934,-48999.79121945370,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4678.973021100701,-49068.58026368990,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4542.148599791983,-49167.98902464041,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4428.982363938387,-49293.67286243552,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4344.420221078563,-49440.13879026564,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4292.157942629668,-49600.98554426307,-1.625812700000000e-08],[-4274.479640942154,-49769.18334944978,-1.625812700000000e-08]]],"type":"Polygon"},
// });

map.setGroupLayer(groupLayer);
// map.addOverlay(overLayer);
// overLayer.addFeature(labelFeature);
```
